channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump sends 'Warrior dividend' checks to service members
item.description: President Trump said military service members are receiving a patriotic chunk of change this holiday season thanks to revenue from his tariffs.

item.description: U.S. weapons systems are also likely difficult to mobilize in case of a conflict.

item.title: Trump’s Hyperbolic Sales Pitch
item.description: If nothing else, Trump’s speech shows the White House realizes the political challenge it faces on the economy.

item.title: Trump admin announces $11B Taiwan arms sales deal

item.title: America Needs AI That Is Pro-Human
item.description: A strong national AI framework is essential. States can help ensure that AI deployment strengthens families, workers, and human agency.

item.title: PayPal CEO Alex Chriss says stablecoins will be key as his company navigates the ‘classic innovator’s dilemma’
item.description: The nearly-three-decade-old firm is incorporating dollar-backed tokens across its business verticals, say PayPal executives.

item.title: You Can Say That Again

item.title: A Wild West Christmas, Courtesy of Frederic Remington and Sid Richardson

item.title: Vivek Ramaswamy Is Wrong About American Identity And Wrong About America
item.description: A disembodied notion of American identity means that America is really nothing at all, and no one is really an American.
